text:
Great location and showcase for your bedding needs! Rinna is really helpful and helped to answer all of our queries about buying a new bed!

10/10 would recommend again!

Back for new purchase. Regular customer, I have been buying from Rinna for 17 years, her service is excellent and patience in providing her recommendations and product knowledge is superb. She will share new products launch as well. Thumbs up for her great service!

Rinna is very patient in showing me the different types of mattress, bed frames and colour sample.

Nice experience
Nice gallery, branch manager Rinna has been very helpful in providing sound advice for the types of mattresses we need.
Rinna had shared her experience and knowledge or the mattress and bed frame with us, with good attitude and service.
